resources.string:
Hi my name is David. 

I love post punk music 

I love painting and relax in my house 

sometimes i go to dance post punk music at some places where they put it 

I am not good enough dancing but i enjoy it, that's matter, isn't it? 

I am positive an proactive guy my dream is create a solution that impact the people's life 

art, philosophy, technology and sports ara my favorites topics 

I'd always dreamt becoming a weird genius. 

If I got crazy, please let me be.
